name: Heirs of the world
description:
In Heirs of the World you are a Robot, which is activated for some reason in a post-apocalyptic world and which must now survive this "new world".

This RPG was made to fit on a business card and all you need to play is this game, a coin and a place to take notes.

So get ready to face challenges in Heirs of the world!

For easier reading on mobile phones download the file heirs of the world smartphone.pdf

This game was made for the Pleasure-not-business Card RPG Jam.
